Display_Partial: EPD_2IN7_V2_Display_Partial(const UBYTE *Image, UWORD Xstart, UWORD Ystart, UWORD Xend, UWORD Yende)

Notes: The SupportedColorChannels is set to 'black' due to the presence of 4GRAY_INITIALIZE function suggesting support for gray shades, which are interpreted under the 'black' channel according to the rules. The function EPD_2IN7_V2_4GrayDisplay might suggest more complex color support, but under current guidelines, no additional colors are added.
